name: Keep It Running: Together
storyline:
After losing his first factory to the player and the Dolls in the first Keep It Running game, the Boss now has found a much larger abandoned one to repurpose for the production of his cursed toys.
With a bigger factory come more kinds of toys too, allowing him to expand his monstrous reach way more than previously.

Now it's up to a group of new workers to either perish whilst slaving away in the factory or... to find a way to defeat him once and for all!
summary:
Keep a 19th century factory running at all costs in this co-op survive-the-night game.
Fuel the boilers, repair any broken machinery and keep the production going at all costs. Keep the Boss happy and fend off the monsters that haunt the factory as you produce cursed children's toys. Do well and be rewarded with new outfits, new challenges and new Achievements as you unlock them! You may just make Employee of the Month~

The game can be played either alone or with up to 4 people over LAN or the internet.
